text: Brigid Berlin (September 6, 1939 â€“ July 17, 2020) was an American artist and Warhol superstar.Watson, Steven (2003), "Factory Made: Warhol and the Sixties" Pantheon Books, pp. 10-12 She was born in New York City. She was known for working as an artistic model for Andy Warhol. She starred as herself in the 1966 Warhol movie Chelsea Girls. Berlin died of cardiac arrest from a pulmonary embolism in New York City on July 17, 2020 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from pulmonary embolism Category:American movie actors Category:Models from New York City Category:Artists from New York City Category:Actors from New York City Category:Andy Warhol
title: Brigid Berlin
